participant_1.background:
I enjoyed a week at the beach, swimming, sunbathing, and reading.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
i used to own several casinos.
i like rollerblading.
i have a rose tattooed on my right ankle.

participant_2.background:
I'm not big on Comic Con because it's too crowded, but my shop has a couple of pieces of custom upholstery that were commissioned by comic book artists.
I'll always cherish the time I spent playing with my siblings and cousins in the backyard.
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: It's been an amazing week so far! I spent the first half of it at the beach and now I'm hanging out with my friends.
I wish I could have spent a week at the beach. I love swimming and sunbathing!
I love doing both of those things too! I also like reading, so I spent a lot of time doing that too.
I love to read too! I wish I had more time to do it, but I'm always so busy with work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a seamstress. I own my own shop and I make custom upholstery.
That's so cool! I've always admired people who can sew.
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I bet it is! I'm so glad you love your work.
Thanks! I am too. It's really important to me to find a job that I love.
I agree! I love my job too. I'm a teacher and I get to work with kids all day.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm sure you love it.
I do! It's the best job in the world
